module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Our payments platform comes with an exclusive reduced fee offer of 0.9% on Debit Card/Prepaid Card/Credit Card (VISA, Mastercard, Maestro) transactions, and 0.5% fees on Rapid Transfer transactions. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 300M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 300M users. With this free official module, benefit from our advanced commerce platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.displayName: Boxtal Connect - 1st shipping solution in Europe
module.description: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Coli
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, Delivengo,UPS, DHL, etc.
module.additional_description: 1. Multiply your conversion rate by 2 and boost your net salesWith our negotiated rates for the best carriers, with no contract and no minimum volume requirement, you offer the best delivery rates to your customers.Maximize your chances to convert by offering the 3 types of shipping expected by your customers: the economic collection point (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis ...), home delivery in 48H (Colissimo) or the express for the most hurried ones (Chronopost, UPS, Fedex, TNT, DHL ...).The Boxtal Connect plugin can display the pick-up location map for carriers of your choice.And it's as simple as a checkbox in your backoffice! 2.  Save 1 hour each day in the management of your shippingsOur free Boxtal Connect plugin allows you to import your orders on boxtal.com in 1 click and manage your shipments in record time. No need to re-enter information, your customer’s choice of delivery is retrieved and the corresponding offers are listed. All you have to do is print all your transport labels and prepare your parcels.Boxtal helps you in the customs formalities for your international shipments: when filling an order, we display the right form and the necessary documents are generated at the same time as the labels. 3. Improve your customers' experience to build loyaltyWith Boxtal's efficient parcel tracking, you know where your parcels are located and you are informed of delays or delivery incidents! Your customers can view tracking statuses and receive shipping notifications if you turn on this option.Finally, you can generate return labels in just a few clicks in case your customers want to do so. 4. Security and reliability for you and your customersThe privacy and security of your data are important to you ? No worries: all the exchanges between your WooCommerce shop and Boxtal are encrypted! Nobody will be able to intercept your information or those of your customers.Ensuring the availability of our solution 24 hours a day is our priority: we constantly monitor our technical infrastructure to ensure that your business will not be disrupted.

module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google Ads, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.additional_description: Synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial: https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001123645-PrestaShop-1-7-Set-up-the-plugin

module.additional_description: PayPlug’s primary goal is to meet the specific needs of small and medium e-commerce companies :Simple set up and managementSafetyOptimized conversionSupport NEW : Oney is now available on PrestaShop 1.6 and 1.7 ! Your customers will be able to pay in 3 or 4 times and you will get paid in 48 hours. Frauds and unpaid transactions will be managed by Oney.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google.
module.additional_description: Specialized in the multichannel collection (online/offline) of customer reviews, Verified Reviews measures, and analyses your customer's satisfaction so you can improve and drive your business decisions. We offer you a multi-tools platform for the management, follow-up, and an optimal diffusion of all contents collected and enable you to increase your reputation, visibility, and search engine ranking on the internet. Why should you choose Verified Reviews?1 - Fast and simpleLearn how to use the solution very quickly and start now collecting reviews from your clients. We can survey people up to 1 year after their orders. Our pre-built Verified Reviews integration with Oracle Commerce Cloud gets your site up and running with ratings and reviews and customer feedback very quickly, saving development time.2 - Website, product & offline reviewsWe collect 3 different types of reviews via one post-transaction email: website reviews where customers can evaluate your online shop; product reviews which mark specifically the purchases, and offline reviews if you want to show a grade for your offline shops. Everything in our solution can be tailored for your needs from emails, forms, campaign deadlines, and widget displays.3 - A global partnership with GoogleWant some stars in your SEM? Use our solution and display stars in your AdWords campaigns and PLA. Customers reviews will also allow optimization of your SEO as they produce active content on your product page.4 - A trusted certificateYour reviews are hosted in a Verified Reviews certificate with your name and logo on it. It gives more credit to them.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Chronopost supports more than 5800 e-merchants in the development of their business. Access the most innovative transport solutions on the market and offer the best express delivery experience to your customers, in France or around the world.
module.additional_description: Thanks to the Chronopost extension, offer your customers the most innovative delivery methods on the market and develop your business in France and abroad easily! No additional development is required, all Chronopost's Express delivery offers and services are included in this module.You will be able to easily present to your customers the different contractualized services.The simple and quick installation and configuration of the module will allow you to start your business quickly.Technical support by Chronopost is available if necessary.

module.description_full: Improve your sales and get higher conversion by giving your shoppers the freedom to pay later. Getting what you want is hard. Paying for it, easy.
module.additional_description: Boost your salesThanks to our flexible payment method, more shoppers can buy your products, increasing your conversion rate. Improve your average ticketShoppers can buy more products, that translates into bigger shopping carts. Marketing toolPagantis allows you to assume the cost of financing and thus offer interest-free financing promotions to your shoppers. As a result you can increase both your average ticket and the conversion of your checkout.Set up promotions according to your Marketing strategy in your User area. Secure paymentNever miss a payment! Pagantis pays you 24h after a purchase has taken place.

module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.additional_description: Stock financing, investment in your e-shop, recruitment...? Finance your growth projects quickly with BoldenAdvance: no paperwork or time wasted thanks to a 100% digital solution and a dedicated contact person. BoldenAdvance is a short-term, repayable and fixed-rate loan that meets all your cash flow needs with more flexibility than a traditional overdraft. You can borrow from €3,000 to €50,000 over a maximum period of 12 months. You can perform one or more repayment schedule simulations, and it is free of charge and without obligation! This financing is available to all commercial companies and individual companies that are Prestashop customers with at least 6 months' activity and a turnover of more than €60,000.

module.name: glotio
module.displayName: Glotio - Translate your PrestaShop in over 50 languages
module.description: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling in other languages ​​from day one
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling in other languages ​​from day one.
module.additional_description: Facilitates international sales Translate your store automatically Glotio is much more than a simple automatic translator tool, is specialized in PrestaShop and it automatically translates many parts of your online store with no need to import/export texts.Multiply your sales, translating your e-commerce shop in more than 50 languages ​​and selling in many countries! How does it work:Download and install our free module. In the PrestaShop marketplace you can find our certified module. Download it for FREE and create your account in just two minutes.We analyze your store for translatable content. Our simple wizard will guide you in a few steps through the process necessary for Glotio to track your PrestaShop for translatable material.Indicate which languages you want to translate your PrestaShop in. Once we know what content is available to carry out the translation, you can tell us which languages you want us to do it in. The first language is FREE! Glotio works, every night, for you. The languages that you have activated in our panel will update automatically every night, so that you have your online store always updated. KEY TOOLSFind and replace: You can always find some word or string of words that you prefer to replace by another. With this tool it will now be a piece of cake. Excluded words: You will most likely want to not translate certain words, such as brands or suppliers. You can automatically add them to the exclusion list. Smart Dictionary: No one knows the products you sell as much as you or your team, so you can teach Glotio how to translate certain words. What does that product provide you?• Boost your SEO: Glotio respects all the SEO of your default language, in this way you can start the organical positioning in any country you decided to sell using their native language.• International Marketing: Exportable data feed in all languages ​​to start marketing campaigns in new countries and multiply your visits. The translations are saved in your PrestaShop, so you can create a data feed in the different languages.• Increase the conversion ratio because you sell in the language of your customers.• Translate your entire online store (catalog, products, categories, attributes, characteristics, manufacturers, suppliers, attachments, etc.) into more than 50 languages ​​in record time.• Suitable for everyone. No programming knowledge or expert PrestaShop or HTML / CSS required.• You save time. Translate your online store quickly.• You pay only what you translate, with no monthly fees.
